title: Soredemo Tsuma wo Aishiteru
synopsis: Nanami is a happily married woman until one day the landlord blackmails her with some embarrassing video footage. From then on she has to become his personal sex slave or he will show the footage to her husband. Based on the erotic game "Sore de mo Tsuma o Aishiteru" by Lune TeamBitters. (Source: ANN)
